# HG Storybook

HG Storybook is a component library based on Headless UI components.


## Components

- Button
- Link
- Toggle
- Icon Button
- Timed Button
- Label
- Tabs
- Input
- Textarea
- Avatar
- Modal
## Installation

Install hg-storybook with npm

```bash
  pnpm add hg-storybook
```

```bash
  npm install hg-storybook
```

## Tech Stack

- React
- Headless UI
- Tailwind
